citation.abstract: As wind power companies venture into ever-deeper waters, the traditional windmill-style turbine may not be the most suitable solution. It’s time to look at alternatives. Wind turbines traditionally had…
citation.title: To farm the deep seas, offshore power must look beyond traditional windmills

blogs.title: Five innovations that could cut the cost of offshore wind
blogs.summary:
Offshore windfarms have a growing role in cutting UK
carbon emissions, but they're expensive. We've selected five
innovations that could help cut costs, from a new Royal
Society journal special issue exploring the cutting edge
of wind power.

blogs.title: Britain is Only Just Beginning to Exploit its Vast Resources of Offshore Wind
blogs.summary:
Dan Tysk wind farm. (Photo: Vattenfall, March 2015)
